2623 enchant.Label = enchant.Class.create(enchant.Entity, {
2624     /**
2625      * @name enchant.Label
2626      * @class
2627      * Label クラス。
2628      * @constructs
2629      * @extends enchant.Entity
2630      */
2631     initialize: function(text) {
2632         enchant.Entity.call(this);
2633 
2634         this.text = text || '';
2635         this.width = 300;
2636         this.font = '14px serif';
2637         this.textAlign = 'left';
2638 
2639         this._debugColor = '#ff0000';
2640     },
2641     width: {
2642         get: function() {
2643             return this._width;
2644         },
2645         set: function(width) {
2646             this._width = width;
2647             this._dirty = true;
2648             // issue #164
2649             this.updateBoundArea();
2650         }
2651     },
2652     /**
2653      * 表示するテキスト.
2654      * DOM レンダラを利用している場合 (DOMScene 以下にある場合) 改行タグ (br) も利用できるが、
2655      * ユーザから入力したり、サーバから取得した文字列を表示する場合, XSS 脆弱性などに注意してください.
2656      * Canvas レンダラを利用できる場合でも、改行タグ (br, BR) は改行に変換されます。
2657      * @type {String}
2658      */
2659     text: {
2660         get: function() {
2661             return this._text;
2662         },
2663         set: function(text) {
2664             text = '' + text;
2665             if(this._text === text) {
2666                 return;
2667             }
2668             this._text = text;
2669             text = text.replace(/<(br|BR) ?\/?>/g, '<br/>');
2670             this._splitText = text.split('<br/>');
2671             this.updateBoundArea();
2672             for (var i = 0, l = this._splitText.length; i < l; i++) {
2673                 text = this._splitText[i];
2674                 var metrics = this.getMetrics(text);
2675                 this._splitText[i] = {};
2676                 this._splitText[i].text = text;
2677                 this._splitText[i].height = metrics.height;
2678             }
2679         }
2680     },
2681     /**
2682      * テキストの水平位置の指定.
2683      * CSSの'text-align'プロパティと同様の形式で指定できる.
2684      * @type {String}
2685      */
2686     textAlign: {
2687         get: function() {
2688             return this._style['text-align'];
2689         },
2690         set: function(textAlign) {
2691             this._style['text-align'] = textAlign;
2692             this.updateBoundArea();
2693         }
2694     },
2695     /**
2696      * フォントの指定.
2697      * CSSの'font'プロパティと同様の形式で指定できる.
2698      * @type {String}
2699      */
2700     font: {
2701         get: function() {
2702             return this._style.font;
2703         },
2704         set: function(font) {
2705             this._style.font = font;
2706             this.updateBoundArea();
2707         }
2708     },
2709     /**
2710      * 文字色の指定.
2711      * CSSの'color'プロパティと同様の形式で指定できる.
2712      * @type {String}
2713      */
2714     color: {
2715         get: function() {
2716             return this._style.color;
2717         },
2718         set: function(color) {
2719             this._style.color = color;
2720         }
2721     },
2722     cvsRender: function(ctx) {
2723         var x, y = 0;
2724         var labelWidth = this.width;
2725         var charWidth, amount, line, text, c, buf, increase, length;
2726         var bufWidth;
2727         if (this._splitText) {
2728             ctx.textBaseline = 'top';
2729             ctx.font = this.font;
2730             ctx.fillStyle = this.color || '#000000';
2731             charWidth = ctx.measureText(' ').width;
2732             amount = labelWidth / charWidth;
2733             for (var i = 0, l = this._splitText.length; i < l; i++) {
2734                 line = this._splitText[i];
2735                 text = line.text;
2736                 c = 0;
2737                 while (text.length > c + amount || ctx.measureText(text.slice(c, c + amount)).width > labelWidth) {
2738                     buf = '';
2739                     increase = amount;
2740                     length = 0;
2741                     while (increase > 0) {
2742                         if (ctx.measureText(buf).width < labelWidth) {
2743                             length += increase;
2744                             buf = text.slice(c, c + length);
2745                         } else {
2746                             length -= increase;
2747                             buf = text.slice(c, c + length);
2748                         }
2749                         increase = increase / 2 | 0;
2750                     }
2751                     ctx.fillText(buf, 0, y);
2752                     y += line.height - 1;
2753                     c += length;
2754                 }
2755                 buf = text.slice(c, c + text.length);
2756                 if (this.textAlign === 'right') {
2757                     x = labelWidth - ctx.measureText(buf).width;
2758                 } else if (this.textAlign === 'center') {
2759                     x = (labelWidth - ctx.measureText(buf).width) / 2;
2760                 } else {
2761                     x = 0;
2762                 }
2763                 ctx.fillText(buf, x, y);
2764                 y += line.height - 1;
2765             }
2766         }
2767     },
2768     domRender: function(element) {
2769         if (element.innerHTML !== this._text) {
2770             element.innerHTML = this._text;
2771         }
2772     },
2773     detectRender: function(ctx) {
2774         ctx.fillRect(this._boundOffset, 0, this._boundWidth, this._boundHeight);
2775     },
2776     updateBoundArea: function() {
2777         var metrics = this.getMetrics();
2778         this._boundWidth = metrics.width;
2779         this._boundHeight = metrics.height;
2780         if (this.textAlign === 'right') {
2781             this._boundOffset = this.width - this._boundWidth;
2782         } else if (this.textAlign === 'center') {
2783             this._boundOffset = (this.width - this._boundWidth) / 2;
2784         } else {
2785             this._boundOffset = 0;
2786         }
2787     },
2788     getMetrics: function(text) {
2789         var ret = {};
2790         var div, width, height;
2791         if (document.body) {
2792             div = document.createElement('div');
2793             for (var prop in this._style) {
2794                 if(prop !== 'width' && prop !== 'height') {
2795                     div.style[prop] = this._style[prop];
2796                 }
2797             }
2798             text = text || this._text;
2799             div.innerHTML = text.replace(/ /g, ' ');
2800             div.style.whiteSpace = 'noWrap';
2801             div.style.lineHeight = 1;
2802             document.body.appendChild(div);
2803             ret.height = parseInt(getComputedStyle(div).height, 10) + 1;
2804             div.style.position = 'absolute';
2805             ret.width = parseInt(getComputedStyle(div).width, 10) + 1;
2806             document.body.removeChild(div);
2807         } else {
2808             ret.width = this.width;
2809             ret.height = this.height;
2810         }
2811         return ret;
2812     }
2813 });

2815 /**
2816  * @scope enchant.Map.prototype
2817  */
2818 enchant.Map = enchant.Class.create(enchant.Entity, {
2819     /**
2820      * @name enchant.Map
2821      * @class
2822      * タイルセットからマップを生成して表示するクラス.
2823      *
2824      * @param {Number} tileWidth タイルの横幅.
2825      * @param {Number} tileHeight タイルの高さ.
2826      * @constructs
2827      * @extends enchant.Entity
2828      */
2829     initialize: function(tileWidth, tileHeight) {
2830         var core = enchant.Core.instance;
2831 
2832         enchant.Entity.call(this);
2833 
2834         var surface = new enchant.Surface(core.width, core.height);
2835         this._surface = surface;
2836         var canvas = surface._element;
2837         canvas.style.position = 'absolute';
2838         if (enchant.ENV.RETINA_DISPLAY && core.scale === 2) {
2839             canvas.width = core.width * 2;
2840             canvas.height = core.height * 2;
2841             this._style.webkitTransformOrigin = '0 0';
2842             this._style.webkitTransform = 'scale(0.5)';
2843         } else {
2844             canvas.width = core.width;
2845             canvas.height = core.height;
2846         }
2847         this._context = canvas.getContext('2d');
2848 
2849         this._tileWidth = tileWidth || 0;
2850         this._tileHeight = tileHeight || 0;
2851         this._image = null;
2852         this._data = [
2853             [
2854                 []
2855             ]
2856         ];
2857         this._dirty = false;
2858         this._tight = false;
2859 
2860         this.touchEnabled = false;
2861 
2862         /**
2863          * タイルが衝突判定を持つかを表す値の二元配列.
2864          * @type {Array.<Array.<Number>>}
2865          */
2866         this.collisionData = null;
2867 
2868         this._listeners['render'] = null;
2869         this.addEventListener('render', function() {
2870             if (this._dirty || this._previousOffsetX == null) {
2871                 this.redraw(0, 0, core.width, core.height);
2872             } else if (this._offsetX !== this._previousOffsetX ||
2873                 this._offsetY !== this._previousOffsetY) {
2874                 if (this._tight) {
2875                     var x = -this._offsetX;
2876                     var y = -this._offsetY;
2877                     var px = -this._previousOffsetX;
2878                     var py = -this._previousOffsetY;
2879                     var w1 = x - px + core.width;
2880                     var w2 = px - x + core.width;
2881                     var h1 = y - py + core.height;
2882                     var h2 = py - y + core.height;
2883                     if (w1 > this._tileWidth && w2 > this._tileWidth &&
2884                         h1 > this._tileHeight && h2 > this._tileHeight) {
2885                         var sx, sy, dx, dy, sw, sh;
2886                         if (w1 < w2) {
2887                             sx = 0;
2888                             dx = px - x;
2889                             sw = w1;
2890                         } else {
2891                             sx = x - px;
2892                             dx = 0;
2893                             sw = w2;
2894                         }
2895                         if (h1 < h2) {
2896                             sy = 0;
2897                             dy = py - y;
2898                             sh = h1;
2899                         } else {
2900                             sy = y - py;
2901                             dy = 0;
2902                             sh = h2;
2903                         }
2904 
2905                         if (core._buffer == null) {
2906                             core._buffer = document.createElement('canvas');
2907                             core._buffer.width = this._context.canvas.width;
2908                             core._buffer.height = this._context.canvas.height;
2909                         }
2910                         var context = core._buffer.getContext('2d');
2911                         if (this._doubledImage) {
2912                             context.clearRect(0, 0, sw * 2, sh * 2);
2913                             context.drawImage(this._context.canvas,
2914                                 sx * 2, sy * 2, sw * 2, sh * 2, 0, 0, sw * 2, sh * 2);
2915                             context = this._context;
2916                             context.clearRect(dx * 2, dy * 2, sw * 2, sh * 2);
2917                             context.drawImage(core._buffer,
2918                                 0, 0, sw * 2, sh * 2, dx * 2, dy * 2, sw * 2, sh * 2);
2919                         } else {
2920                             context.clearRect(0, 0, sw, sh);
2921                             context.drawImage(this._context.canvas,
2922                                 sx, sy, sw, sh, 0, 0, sw, sh);
2923                             context = this._context;
2924                             context.clearRect(dx, dy, sw, sh);
2925                             context.drawImage(core._buffer,
2926                                 0, 0, sw, sh, dx, dy, sw, sh);
2927                         }
2928 
2929                         if (dx === 0) {
2930                             this.redraw(sw, 0, core.width - sw, core.height);
2931                         } else {
2932                             this.redraw(0, 0, core.width - sw, core.height);
2933                         }
2934                         if (dy === 0) {
2935                             this.redraw(0, sh, core.width, core.height - sh);
2936                         } else {
2937                             this.redraw(0, 0, core.width, core.height - sh);
2938                         }
2939                     } else {
2940                         this.redraw(0, 0, core.width, core.height);
2941                     }
2942                 } else {
2943                     this.redraw(0, 0, core.width, core.height);
2944                 }
2945             }
2946             this._previousOffsetX = this._offsetX;
2947             this._previousOffsetY = this._offsetY;
2948         });
2949     },
2950     /**
2951      * データを設定する.
2952      * タイルががimageプロパティの画像に左上から順に配列されていると見て, 0から始まる
2953      * インデックスの二元配列を設定する.複数指定された場合は後のものから順に表示される.
2954      * @param {...Array<Array.<Number>>} data タイルのインデックスの二元配列. 複数指定できる.
2955      */
2956     loadData: function(data) {
2957         this._data = Array.prototype.slice.apply(arguments);
2958         this._dirty = true;
2959 
2960         this._tight = false;
2961         for (var i = 0, len = this._data.length; i < len; i++) {
2962             var c = 0;
2963             data = this._data[i];
2964             for (var y = 0, l = data.length; y < l; y++) {
2965                 for (var x = 0, ll = data[y].length; x < ll; x++) {
2966                     if (data[y][x] >= 0) {
2967                         c++;
2968                     }
2969                 }
2970             }
2971             if (c / (data.length * data[0].length) > 0.2) {
2972                 this._tight = true;
2973                 break;
2974             }
2975         }
2976     },
2977     /**
2978      * ある座標のタイルが何か調べる.
2979      * @param {Number} x マップ上の点のx座標.
2980      * @param {Number} y マップ上の点のy座標.
2981      * @return {*} ある座標のタイルのデータ.
2982      */
2983     checkTile: function(x, y) {
2984         if (x < 0 || this.width <= x || y < 0 || this.height <= y) {
2985             return false;
2986         }
2987         var width = this._image.width;
2988         var height = this._image.height;
2989         var tileWidth = this._tileWidth || width;
2990         var tileHeight = this._tileHeight || height;
2991         x = x / tileWidth | 0;
2992         y = y / tileHeight | 0;
2993         //		return this._data[y][x];
2994         var data = this._data[0];
2995         return data[y][x];
2996     },
2997     /**
2998      * Map上に障害物があるかどうかを判定する.
2999      * @param {Number} x 判定を行うマップ上の点のx座標.
3000      * @param {Number} y 判定を行うマップ上の点のy座標.
3001      * @return {Boolean} 障害物があるかどうか.
3002      */
3003     hitTest: function(x, y) {
3004         if (x < 0 || this.width <= x || y < 0 || this.height <= y) {
3005             return false;
3006         }
3007         var width = this._image.width;
3008         var height = this._image.height;
3009         var tileWidth = this._tileWidth || width;
3010         var tileHeight = this._tileHeight || height;
3011         x = x / tileWidth | 0;
3012         y = y / tileHeight | 0;
3013         if (this.collisionData != null) {
3014             return this.collisionData[y] && !!this.collisionData[y][x];
3015         } else {
3016             for (var i = 0, len = this._data.length; i < len; i++) {
3017                 var data = this._data[i];
3018                 var n;
3019                 if (data[y] != null && (n = data[y][x]) != null &&
3020                     0 <= n && n < (width / tileWidth | 0) * (height / tileHeight | 0)) {
3021                     return true;
3022                 }
3023             }
3024             return false;
3025         }
3026     },
3027     /**
3028      * Mapで表示するタイルセット画像.
3029      * @type {enchant.Surface}
3030      */
3031     image: {
3032         get: function() {
3033             return this._image;
3034         },
3035         set: function(image) {
3036             var core = enchant.Core.instance;
3037 
3038             this._image = image;
3039             if (enchant.ENV.RETINA_DISPLAY && core.scale === 2) {
3040                 var img = new enchant.Surface(image.width * 2, image.height * 2);
3041                 var tileWidth = this._tileWidth || image.width;
3042                 var tileHeight = this._tileHeight || image.height;
3043                 var row = image.width / tileWidth | 0;
3044                 var col = image.height / tileHeight | 0;
3045                 for (var y = 0; y < col; y++) {
3046                     for (var x = 0; x < row; x++) {
3047                         img.draw(image, x * tileWidth, y * tileHeight, tileWidth, tileHeight,
3048                             x * tileWidth * 2, y * tileHeight * 2, tileWidth * 2, tileHeight * 2);
3049                     }
3050                 }
3051                 this._doubledImage = img;
3052             }
3053             this._dirty = true;
3054         }
3055     },
3056     /**
3057      * Mapのタイルの横幅.
3058      * @type {Number}
3059      */
3060     tileWidth: {
3061         get: function() {
3062             return this._tileWidth;
3063         },
3064         set: function(tileWidth) {
3065             this._tileWidth = tileWidth;
3066             this._dirty = true;
3067         }
3068     },
3069     /**
3070      * Mapのタイルの高さ.
3071      * @type {Number}
3072      */
3073     tileHeight: {
3074         get: function() {
3075             return this._tileHeight;
3076         },
3077         set: function(tileHeight) {
3078             this._tileHeight = tileHeight;
3079             this._dirty = true;
3080         }
3081     },
3082     /**
3083      * @private
3084      */
3085     width: {
3086         get: function() {
3087             return this._tileWidth * this._data[0][0].length;
3088         }
3089     },
3090     /**
3091      * @private
3092      */
3093     height: {
3094         get: function() {
3095             return this._tileHeight * this._data[0].length;
3096         }
3097     },
3098     /**
3099      * @private
3100      */
3101     redraw: function(x, y, width, height) {
3102         if (this._image == null) {
3103             return;
3104         }
3105 
3106         var image, tileWidth, tileHeight, dx, dy;
3107         if (this._doubledImage) {
3108             image = this._doubledImage;
3109             tileWidth = this._tileWidth * 2;
3110             tileHeight = this._tileHeight * 2;
3111             dx = -this._offsetX * 2;
3112             dy = -this._offsetY * 2;
3113             x *= 2;
3114             y *= 2;
3115             width *= 2;
3116             height *= 2;
3117         } else {
3118             image = this._image;
3119             tileWidth = this._tileWidth;
3120             tileHeight = this._tileHeight;
3121             dx = -this._offsetX;
3122             dy = -this._offsetY;
3123         }
3124         var row = image.width / tileWidth | 0;
3125         var col = image.height / tileHeight | 0;
3126         var left = Math.max((x + dx) / tileWidth | 0, 0);
3127         var top = Math.max((y + dy) / tileHeight | 0, 0);
3128         var right = Math.ceil((x + dx + width) / tileWidth);
3129         var bottom = Math.ceil((y + dy + height) / tileHeight);
3130 
3131         var source = image._element;
3132         var context = this._context;
3133         var canvas = context.canvas;
3134         context.clearRect(x, y, width, height);
3135         for (var i = 0, len = this._data.length; i < len; i++) {
3136             var data = this._data[i];
3137             var r = Math.min(right, data[0].length);
3138             var b = Math.min(bottom, data.length);
3139             for (y = top; y < b; y++) {
3140                 for (x = left; x < r; x++) {
3141                     var n = data[y][x];
3142                     if (0 <= n && n < row * col) {
3143                         var sx = (n % row) * tileWidth;
3144                         var sy = (n / row | 0) * tileHeight;
3145                         context.drawImage(source, sx, sy, tileWidth, tileHeight,
3146                             x * tileWidth - dx, y * tileHeight - dy, tileWidth, tileHeight);
3147                     }
3148                 }
3149             }
3150         }
3151     },
3152     cvsRender: function(ctx) {
3153         var core = enchant.Core.instance;
3154         if (this.width !== 0 && this.height !== 0) {
3155             ctx.save();
3156             ctx.setTransform(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0);
3157             var cvs = this._context.canvas;
3158                 ctx.drawImage(cvs, 0, 0, core.width, core.height);
3159             ctx.restore();
3160         }
3161     },
3162     domRender: function(element) {
3163         if (this._image) {
3164             this._style['background-image'] = this._surface._css;
3165             // bad performance
3166             this._style[enchant.ENV.VENDOR_PREFIX + 'Transform'] = 'matrix(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0)';
3167         }
3168     }
3169 });

3172 /**
3173  * @scope enchant.Group.prototype
3174  */
3175 enchant.Group = enchant.Class.create(enchant.Node, {
3176     /**
3177      * @name enchant.Group
3178      * @class
3179      * 複数の{@link enchant.Node}を子に持つことができるクラス.
3180      *
3181      * @example
3182      *   var stage = new Group();
3183      *   stage.addChild(player);
3184      *   stage.addChild(enemy);
3185      *   stage.addChild(map);
3186      *   stage.addEventListener('enterframe', function() {
3187      *      // playerの座標に従って全体をスクロールする
3188      *      if (this.x > 64 - player.x) {

3190      *      }
3191      *   });

3229     addChild: function(node) {
3230         if (node.parentNode) {
3231             node.parentNode.removeChild(node);
3232         }

3234         node.parentNode = this;

3236         childAdded.node = node;
3237         childAdded.next = null;

3240         if (this.scene) {

3254         }

3258             node.parentNode = this;

3260             childAdded.node = node;
3261             childAdded.next = reference;
3262             this.dispatchEvent(childAdded);
3263             node.dispatchEvent(new enchant.Event('added'));
3264             if (this.scene) {
3265                 node.scene = this.scene;

3268             }

3286             if (this.scene) {
3287                 node.scene = null;

3396 enchant.Matrix = enchant.Class.create({
3397     initialize: function() {
3398         this.reset();
3399     },
3400     reset: function() {
3401         this.stack = [];
3402         this.stack.push([ 1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0 ]);
3403     },
3404     makeTransformMatrix: function(node, dest) {
3405         var x = node._x;
3406         var y = node._y;
3407         var width = node.width || 0;
3408         var height = node.height || 0;
3409         var rotation = node._rotation || 0;
3410         var scaleX = (typeof node._scaleX === 'number') ? node._scaleX : 1;
3411         var scaleY = (typeof node._scaleY === 'number') ? node._scaleY : 1;
3412         var theta = rotation * Math.PI / 180;
3413         var tmpcos = Math.cos(theta);
3414         var tmpsin = Math.sin(theta);
3415         var w = (typeof node._originX === 'number') ? node._originX : width / 2;
3416         var h = (typeof node._originY === 'number') ? node._originY : height / 2;
3417         var a = scaleX * tmpcos;
3418         var b = scaleX * tmpsin;
3419         var c = scaleY * tmpsin;
3420         var d = scaleY * tmpcos;
3421         dest[0] = a;
3422         dest[1] = b;
3423         dest[2] = -c;
3424         dest[3] = d;
3425         dest[4] = (-a * w + c * h + x + w);
3426         dest[5] = (-b * w - d * h + y + h);
3427     },
3428     multiply: function(m1, m2, dest) {
3429         var a11 = m1[0], a21 = m1[2], adx = m1[4],
3430             a12 = m1[1], a22 = m1[3], ady = m1[5];
3431         var b11 = m2[0], b21 = m2[2], bdx = m2[4],
3432             b12 = m2[1], b22 = m2[3], bdy = m2[5];
3433 
3434         dest[0] = a11 * b11 + a21 * b12;
3435         dest[1] = a12 * b11 + a22 * b12;
3436         dest[2] = a11 * b21 + a21 * b22;
3437         dest[3] = a12 * b21 + a22 * b22;
3438         dest[4] = a11 * bdx + a21 * bdy + adx;
3439         dest[5] = a12 * bdx + a22 * bdy + ady;
3440     },
3441     multiplyVec: function(mat, vec, dest) {
3442         var x = vec[0], y = vec[1];
3443         var m11 = mat[0], m21 = mat[2], mdx = mat[4],
3444             m12 = mat[1], m22 = mat[3], mdy = mat[5];
3445         dest[0] = m11 * x + m21 * y + mdx;
3446         dest[1] = m12 * x + m22 * y + mdy;
3447     }
3448 });
3449 enchant.Matrix.instance = new enchant.Matrix();

3451 enchant.DetectColorManager = enchant.Class.create({
3452     initialize: function(reso, max) {
3453         this.reference = [];
3454         this.colorResolution = reso || 16;
3455         this.max = max || 1;
3456         this.capacity = Math.pow(this.colorResolution, 3);
3457         for (var i = 1, l = this.capacity; i < l; i++) {
3458             this.reference[i] = null;
3459         }
3460     },
3461     attachDetectColor: function(sprite) {
3462         var i = this.reference.indexOf(null);
3463         if (i === -1) {
3464             i = 1;
3465         }
3466         this.reference[i] = sprite;
3467         return this._getColor(i);
3468     },
3469     detachDetectColor: function(sprite) {
3470         var i = this.reference.indexOf(sprite);
3471         if (i !== -1) {
3472             this.reference[i] = null;
3473         }
3474     },
3475     _getColor: function(n) {
3476         var C = this.colorResolution;
3477         var d = C / this.max;
3478         return [
3479             parseInt((n / C / C) % C, 10) / d,
3480             parseInt((n / C) % C, 10) / d,
3481             parseInt(n % C, 10) / d,
3482             1.0
3483         ];
3484     },
3485     _decodeDetectColor: function(color) {
3486         var C = this.colorResolution;
3487         return ~~(color[0] * C * C * C / 256) +
3488             ~~(color[1] * C * C / 256) +
3489             ~~(color[2] * C / 256);
3490     },
3491     getSpriteByColor: function(color) {
3492         return this.reference[this._decodeDetectColor(color)];
3493     }
3494 });

3661 enchant.DomlessManager = enchant.Class.create({
3662     initialize: function(node) {
3663         this._domRef = [];
3664         this.targetNode = node;
3665     },
3666     _register: function(element, nextElement) {
3667         var i = this._domRef.indexOf(nextElement);
3668         var childNodes;
3669         if (element instanceof Array) {
3670             if (i === -1) {
3671                 Array.prototype.push.apply(this._domRef, element);
3672             } else {
3673                 Array.prototype.splice.apply(this._domRef, [i, 0].concat(element));
3674             }
3675         } else {
3676             if (i === -1) {
3677                 this._domRef.push(element);
3678             } else {
3679                 this._domRef.splice(i, 0, element);
3680             }
3681         }
3682     },
3683     getNextManager: function(manager) {
3684         var i = this.targetNode.parentNode.childNodes.indexOf(manager.targetNode);
3685         if (i !== this.targetNode.parentNode.childNodes.length - 1) {
3686             return this.targetNode.parentNode.childNodes[i + 1]._domManager;
3687         } else {
3688             return null;
3689         }
3690     },
3691     getDomElement: function() {
3692         var ret = [];
3693         this.targetNode.childNodes.forEach(function(child) {
3694             ret = ret.concat(child._domManager.getDomElement());
3695         });
3696         return ret;
3697     },
3698     getDomElementAsNext: function() {
3699         if (this._domRef.length) {
3700             return this._domRef[0];
3701         } else {
3702             var nextManager = this.getNextManager(this);
3703             if (nextManager) {
3704                 return nextManager.element;
3705             } else {
3706                 return null;
3707             }
3708         }
3709     },
3710     addManager: function(childManager, nextManager) {
3711         var parentNode = this.targetNode.parentNode;
3712         if (parentNode) {
3713             if (nextManager === null) {
3714                 nextManager = this.getNextManager(this);
3715             }
3716             if (parentNode instanceof enchant.Scene) {
3717                 parentNode._layers.Dom._domManager.addManager(childManager, nextManager);
3718             } else {
3719                 parentNode._domManager.addManager(childManager, nextManager);
3720             }
3721         }
3722         var nextElement = nextManager ? nextManager.getDomElementAsNext() : null;
3723         this._register(childManager.getDomElement(), nextElement);
3724         this.setLayer(this.layer);
3725     },
3726     removeManager: function(childManager) {
3727         var dom;
3728         var i = this._domRef.indexOf(childManager.element);
3729         if (i !== -1) {
3730             dom = this._domRef[i];
3731             dom.parentNode.removeChild(dom);
3732             this._domRef.splice(i, 1);
3733         }
3734         this.setLayer(this.layer);
3735     },
3736     setLayer: function(layer) {
3737         this.layer = layer;
3738         var node = this.targetNode;
3739         var manager;
3740         if (node.childNodes) {
3741             for (var i = 0, l = node.childNodes.length; i < l; i++) {
3742                 manager = node.childNodes[i]._domManager;
3743                 if (manager) {
3744                     manager.setLayer(layer);
3745                 }
3746             }
3747         }
3748     },
3749     render: function(inheritMat) {
3750         var matrix = enchant.Matrix.instance;
3751         var stack = matrix.stack;
3752         var node = this.targetNode;
3753         var dest = [];
3754         matrix.makeTransformMatrix(node, dest);
3755         matrix.multiply(stack[stack.length - 1], dest, dest);
3756         matrix.multiply(inheritMat, dest, inheritMat);
3757         node._matrix = inheritMat;
3758         var ox = (typeof node._originX === 'number') ? node._originX : node.width / 2 || 0;
3759         var oy = (typeof node._originY === 'number') ? node._originY : node.height / 2 || 0;
3760         var vec = [ ox, oy ];
3761         matrix.multiplyVec(dest, vec, vec);
3762         node._offsetX = vec[0] - ox;
3763         node._offsetY = vec[1] - oy;
3764         stack.push(dest);
3765     },

3767         this._domRef = [];
3768         this.targetNode = null;
3769     }

3912 enchant.DomLayer._attachDomManager = function(node, onchildadded, onchildremoved) {
3913     var child;
3914     if (!node._domManager) {
3915         node.addEventListener('childadded', onchildadded);
3916         node.addEventListener('childremoved', onchildremoved);
3917         if (node instanceof enchant.Group) {
3918             node._domManager = new enchant.DomlessManager(node);
3919         } else {
3920             if (node._element) {
3921                 node._domManager = new enchant.DomManager(node, node._element);
3922             } else {
3923                 node._domManager = new enchant.DomManager(node, 'div');
3924             }
3925         }
3926     }
3927     if (node.childNodes) {
3928         for (var i = 0, l = node.childNodes.length; i < l; i++) {
3929             child = node.childNodes[i];
3930             enchant.DomLayer._attachDomManager(child, onchildadded, onchildremoved);
3931             node._domManager.addManager(child._domManager, null);
3932         }
3933     }
3934 };

3936 enchant.DomLayer._detachDomManager = function(node, onchildadded, onchildremoved) {
3937     var child;

3942             child = node.childNodes[i];
3943             node._domManager.removeManager(child._domManager, null);
3944             enchant.DomLayer._detachDomManager(child, onchildadded, onchildremoved);
3945         }
3946     }

4163 enchant.CanvasRenderer = enchant.Class.create({
4164     render: function(ctx, node, e) {
4165         var width, height, child;
4166         ctx.save();
4167         node.dispatchEvent(e);
4168         // transform
4169         this.transform(ctx, node);
4170         if (typeof node._visible === 'undefined' || node._visible) {
4171             width = node.width;
4172             height = node.height;
4173             // composite
4174             if (node.compositeOperation) {
4175                 ctx.globalCompositeOperation = node.compositeOperation;
4176             }
4177             ctx.globalAlpha = (typeof node._opacity === 'number') ? node._opacity : 1.0;
4178             // render
4179             if (node._backgroundColor) {
4180                 ctx.fillStyle = node._backgroundColor;
4181                 ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
4182             }
4183 
4184             if (node.cvsRender) {
4185                 node.cvsRender(ctx);
4186             }
4187 
4188             if (enchant.Core.instance._debug && node._debugColor) {
4189                 ctx.strokeStyle = node._debugColor;
4190                 ctx.strokeRect(0, 0, width, height);
4191             }
4192             if (node._clipping) {
4193                 ctx.beginPath();
4194                 ctx.rect(0, 0, width, height);
4195                 ctx.clip();
4196             }
4197             if (node.childNodes) {
4198                 for (var i = 0, l = node.childNodes.length; i < l; i++) {
4199                     child = node.childNodes[i];
4200                     this.render(ctx, child, e);
4201                 }
4202             }
4203         }
4204         ctx.restore();
4205         enchant.Matrix.instance.stack.pop();
4206     },
4207     detectRender: function(ctx, node) {
4208         var width, height, child;
4209         if (typeof node._visible === 'undefined' || node._visible) {
4210             width = node.width;
4211             height = node.height;
4212             ctx.save();
4213             this.transform(ctx, node);
4214             ctx.fillStyle = node._cvsCache.detectColor;
4215             if (node._touchEnabled) {
4216                 if (node.detectRender) {
4217                     node.detectRender(ctx);
4218                 } else {
4219                     ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);
4220                 }
4221             }
4222             if (node._clipping) {
4223                 ctx.beginPath();
4224                 ctx.rect(0, 0, width, height);
4225                 ctx.clip();
4226             }
4227             if (node.childNodes) {
4228                 for (var i = 0, l = node.childNodes.length; i < l; i++) {
4229                     child = node.childNodes[i];
4230                     this.detectRender(ctx, child);
4231                 }
4232             }
4233             ctx.restore();
4234             enchant.Matrix.instance.stack.pop();
4235         }
4236     },
4237     transform: function(ctx, node) {
4238         var matrix = enchant.Matrix.instance;
4239         var stack = matrix.stack;
4240         var newmat, ox, oy, vec;
4241         if (node._dirty) {
4242             matrix.makeTransformMatrix(node, node._cvsCache.matrix);
4243             newmat = [];
4244             matrix.multiply(stack[stack.length - 1], node._cvsCache.matrix, newmat);
4245             node._matrix = newmat;
4246             ox = (typeof node._originX === 'number') ? node._originX : node._width / 2 || 0;
4247             oy = (typeof node._originY === 'number') ? node._originY : node._height / 2 || 0;
4248             vec = [ ox, oy ];
4249             matrix.multiplyVec(newmat, vec, vec);
4250             node._offsetX = vec[0] - ox;
4251             node._offsetY = vec[1] - oy;
4252             node._dirty = false;
4253         } else {
4254             newmat = node._matrix;
4255         }
4256         stack.push(newmat);
4257         ctx.setTransform.apply(ctx, newmat);
4258     }
4259 });
4260 enchant.CanvasRenderer.instance = new enchant.CanvasRenderer();

4266 enchant.Scene = enchant.Class.create(enchant.Group, {
4267     /**
4268      * @name enchant.Scene
4269      * @class
4270      * 表示オブジェクトツリーのルートになるクラス.
4271      * シーンはレイヤーを持っていて、子として追加されたオブジェクト (Entity) は描画方法に応じてレイヤーに振り分けられる。
4272      * Scene クラスは最も汎用的なシーンの実装で、({@link enchant.DOMLayer} と {@link enchant.CanvasLayer}) を持っており、
4273      * それぞれ DOM, Canvas を用いて描画される。描画順は DOM が手前、Canvas が奥で、
4274      * 各レイヤーの間では新しく追加されたオブジェクトほど手前に表示される。
4275      * Scene クラスを継承することで、新しい種類の Layer を持つシーンクラスを作ることができる。
4276      *
4277      * @example
4278      *   var scene = new Scene();
4279      *   scene.addChild(player);
4280      *   scene.addChild(enemy);
4281      *   core.pushScene(scene);
4282      *
4283      * @constructs
4284      * @extends enchant.Group
4285      */

4310

4313             var layer;
4314             for (var prop in that._layers) {
4315                 layer = that._layers[prop];
4316                 layer.dispatchEvent(new enchant.Event(enchant.Event.EXIT_FRAME));

4420     addLayer: function(type, i) {
4421         var core = enchant.Core.instance;
4422         if (this._layers[type]) {
4423             return;

4426         if (core.currentScene === this) {
4427             layer._startRendering();

4430         var element = layer._element;
4431         if (typeof i === 'number') {

4433             if (nextSibling) {
4434                 this._element.insertBefore(element, nextSibling);
4435             } else {
4436                 this._element.appendChild(element);
4437             }
4438             this._layerPriority.splice(i, 0, type);
4439         } else {

4442         }

4444     },
4445     _determineEventTarget: function(e) {

4448             layer = this._layers[this._layerPriority[i]];
4449             target = layer._determineEventTarget(e);
4450             if (target) {
4451                 break;
4452             }
4453         }
4454         if (!target) {
4455             target = this;
4456         }
4457         return target;
4458     },
4459     _onchildadded: function(e) {
4460         var child = e.node;
4461         var next = e.next;
4462         var target, i;
4463         if (child._element) {
4464             target = 'Dom';
4465             i = 1;
4466         } else {
4467             target = 'Canvas';
4468             i = 0;
4469         }
4470         if (!this._layers[target]) {
4471             this.addLayer(target, i);
4472         }
4473         child._layer = this._layers[target];
4474         this._layers[target].insertBefore(child, next);
4475         child.parentNode = this;
4476     },
4477     _onchildremoved: function(e) {
4478         var child = e.node;
4479         child._layer.removeChild(child);
4480         child._layer = null;
4481     },
4482     _onenter: function() {
4483         for (var type in this._layers) {
4484             this._layers[type]._startRendering();
4485         }
4486         enchant.Core.instance.addEventListener('exitframe', this._dispatchExitframe);
4487     },
4488     _onexit: function() {
4489         for (var type in this._layers) {
4490             this._layers[type]._stopRendering();
4491         }
4492         enchant.Core.instance.removeEventListener('exitframe', this._dispatchExitframe);
4493     }
4494 });

4496 /**
4497  * @scope enchant.LoadingScene.prototype
4498  */
4499 enchant.LoadingScene = enchant.Class.create(enchant.Scene, {
4500     /**
4501      * @name enchant.LoadingScene.
4502      * @class
4503      * @constructs
4504      * @extends enchant.Scene
4505      */
4506     initialize: function() {
4507         enchant.Scene.call(this);
4508         this.backgroundColor = '#000';
4509         var barWidth = this.width * 0.4 | 0;
4510         var barHeight = this.width * 0.05 | 0;
4511         var border = barWidth * 0.03 | 0;
4512         var bar = new enchant.Sprite(barWidth, barHeight);
4513         bar.disableCollection();
4514         bar.x = (this.width - barWidth) / 2;
4515         bar.y = (this.height - barHeight) / 2;
4516         var image = new enchant.Surface(barWidth, barHeight);
4517         image.context.fillStyle = '#fff';
4518         image.context.fillRect(0, 0, barWidth, barHeight);
4519         image.context.fillStyle = '#000';
4520         image.context.fillRect(border, border, barWidth - border * 2, barHeight - border * 2);
4521         bar.image = image;
4522         var progress = 0, _progress = 0;
4523         this.addEventListener('progress', function(e) {
4524             // avoid #167 https://github.com/wise9/enchant.js/issues/177
4525             progress = e.loaded / e.total * 1.0;
4526         });
4527         bar.addEventListener('enterframe', function() {
4528             _progress *= 0.9;
4529             _progress += progress * 0.1;
4530             image.context.fillStyle = '#fff';
4531             image.context.fillRect(border, 0, (barWidth - border * 2) * _progress, barHeight);
4532         });
4533         this.addChild(bar);
4534         this.addEventListener('load', function(e) {
4535             var core = enchant.Core.instance;
4536             core.removeScene(core.loadingScene);
4537             core.dispatchEvent(e);
4538         });
4539     }
4540 });

4606 /**
4607  * @scope enchant.Surface.prototype
4608  */
4609 enchant.Surface = enchant.Class.create(enchant.EventTarget, {
4610     /**
4611      * @name enchant.Surface
4612      * @class
4613      * canvas要素をラップしたクラス.
4614      *
4615      * {@link enchant.Sprite}や{@link enchant.Map}のimageプロパティに設定して表示させることができる.
4616      * Canvas APIにアクセスしたいときは{@link enchant.Surface#context}プロパティを用いる.
4617      *
4618      * @example
4619      *   // 円を表示するSpriteを作成する
4620      *   var ball = new Sprite(50, 50);
4621      *   var surface = new Surface(50, 50);
4622      *   surface.context.beginPath();
4623      *   surface.context.arc(25, 25, 25, 0, Math.PI*2, true);
4624      *   surface.context.fill();
4625      *   ball.image = surface;
4626      *
4627      * @param {Number} width Surfaceの横幅.
4628      * @param {Number} height Surfaceの高さ.
4629      * @constructs
4630      */
4631     initialize: function(width, height) {
4632         enchant.EventTarget.call(this);
4633 
4634         var core = enchant.Core.instance;
4635 
4636         /**
4637          * Surfaceの横幅.
4638          * @type {Number}
4639          */
4640         this.width = width;
4641         /**
4642          * Surfaceの高さ.
4643          * @type {Number}
4644          */
4645         this.height = height;
4646         /**
4647          * Surfaceの描画コンテクスト.
4648          * @type {CanvasRenderingContext2D}
4649          */
4650         this.context = null;
4651 
4652         var id = 'enchant-surface' + core._surfaceID++;
4653         if (document.getCSSCanvasContext) {
4654             this.context = document.getCSSCanvasContext('2d', id, width, height);
4655             this._element = this.context.canvas;
4656             this._css = '-webkit-canvas(' + id + ')';
4657             var context = this.context;
4658         } else if (document.mozSetImageElement) {
4659             this._element = document.createElement('canvas');
4660             this._element.width = width;
4661             this._element.height = height;
4662             this._css = '-moz-element(#' + id + ')';
4663             this.context = this._element.getContext('2d');
4664             document.mozSetImageElement(id, this._element);
4665         } else {
4666             this._element = document.createElement('canvas');
4667             this._element.width = width;
4668             this._element.height = height;
4669             this._element.style.position = 'absolute';
4670             this.context = this._element.getContext('2d');
4671 
4672             enchant.ENV.CANVAS_DRAWING_METHODS.forEach(function(name) {
4673                 var method = this.context[name];
4674                 this.context[name] = function() {
4675                     method.apply(this, arguments);
4676                     this._dirty = true;
4677                 };
4678             }, this);
4679         }
4680     },
4681     /**
4682      * Surfaceから1ピクセル取得する.
4683      * @param {Number} x 取得するピクセルのx座標.
4684      * @param {Number} y 取得するピクセルのy座標.
4685      * @return {Array.<Number>} ピクセルの情報を[r, g, b, a]の形式で持つ配列.
4686      */
4687     getPixel: function(x, y) {
4688         return this.context.getImageData(x, y, 1, 1).data;
4689     },
4690     /**
4691      * Surfaceに1ピクセル設定する.
4692      * @param {Number} x 設定するピクセルのx座標.
4693      * @param {Number} y 設定するピクセルのy座標.
4694      * @param {Number} r 設定するピクセルのrの値.
4695      * @param {Number} g 設定するピクセルのgの値.
4696      * @param {Number} b 設定するピクセルのbの値.
4697      * @param {Number} a 設定するピクセルの透明度.
4698      */
4699     setPixel: function(x, y, r, g, b, a) {
4700         var pixel = this.context.createImageData(1, 1);
4701         pixel.data[0] = r;
4702         pixel.data[1] = g;
4703         pixel.data[2] = b;
4704         pixel.data[3] = a;
4705         this.context.putImageData(pixel, x, y);
4706     },
4707     /**
4708      * Surfaceの全ピクセルをクリアし透明度0の黒に設定する.
4709      */
4710     clear: function() {
4711         this.context.clearRect(0, 0, this.width, this.height);
4712     },
4713     /**
4714      * Surfaceに対して引数で指定されたSurfaceを描画する.
4715      *
4716      * Canvas APIのdrawImageをラップしており, 描画する矩形を同様の形式で指定できる.
4717      *
4718      * @example
4719      *   var src = core.assets['src.gif'];
4720      *   var dst = new Surface(100, 100);
4721      *   dst.draw(src);         // ソースを(0, 0)に描画
4722      *   dst.draw(src, 50, 50); // ソースを(50, 50)に描画
4723      *   // ソースを(50, 50)に縦横30ピクセル分だけ描画
4724      *   dst.draw(src, 50, 50, 30, 30);
4725      *   // ソースの(10, 10)から縦横40ピクセルの領域を(50, 50)に縦横30ピクセルに縮小して描画
4726      *   dst.draw(src, 10, 10, 40, 40, 50, 50, 30, 30);
4727      *
4728      * @param {enchant.Surface} image 描画に用いるSurface.
4729      */
4730     draw: function(image) {
4731         image = image._element;
4732         if (arguments.length === 1) {
4733             this.context.drawImage(image, 0, 0);
4734         } else {
4735             var args = arguments;
4736             args[0] = image;
4737             this.context.drawImage.apply(this.context, args);
4738         }
4739     },
4740     /**
4741      * Surfaceを複製する.
4742      * @return {enchant.Surface} 複製されたSurface.
4743      */
4744     clone: function() {
4745         var clone = new enchant.Surface(this.width, this.height);
4746         clone.draw(this);
4747         return clone;
4748     },
4749     /**
4750      * SurfaceからdataスキームのURLを生成する.
4751      * @return {String} Surfaceを表すdataスキームのURL.
4752      */
4753     toDataURL: function() {
4754         var src = this._element.src;
4755         if (src) {
4756             if (src.slice(0, 5) === 'data:') {
4757                 return src;
4758             } else {
4759                 return this.clone().toDataURL();
4760             }
4761         } else {
4762             return this._element.toDataURL();
4763         }
4764     }
4765 });
4766 
4767 /**
4768  * 画像ファイルを読み込んでSurfaceオブジェクトを作成する.
4769  *
4770  * このメソッドによって作成されたSurfaceはimg要素のラップしており{@link enchant.Surface#context}プロパティに
4771  * アクセスしたり{@link enchant.Surface#draw}, {@link enchant.Surface#clear}, {@link enchant.Surface#getPixel},
4772  * {@link enchant.Surface#setPixel}メソッドなどの呼び出しでCanvas APIを使った画像操作を行うことはできない.
4773  * ただし{@link enchant.Surface#draw}メソッドの引数とすることはでき,
4774  * ほかのSurfaceに描画した上で画像操作を行うことはできる(クロスドメインでロードした
4775  * 場合はピクセルを取得するなど画像操作の一部が制限される).
4776  *
4777  * @param {String} src ロードする画像ファイルのパス.
4778  * @param {Function} callback ロード完了時のコールバック.
4779  * @param {Function} [onerror] ロード失敗時のコールバック.
4780  * @static
4781  * @return {enchant.Surface} Surface
4782  */
4783 enchant.Surface.load = function(src, callback, onerror) {
4784     var image = new Image();
4785     var surface = Object.create(enchant.Surface.prototype, {
4786         context: { value: null },
4787         _css: { value: 'url(' + src + ')' },
4788         _element: { value: image }
4789     });
4790     enchant.EventTarget.call(surface);
4791     onerror = onerror || function() {};
4792     surface.addEventListener('load', callback);
4793     surface.addEventListener('error', onerror);
4794     image.onerror = function() {
4795         var e = new enchant.Event(enchant.Event.ERROR);
4796         e.message = 'Cannot load an asset: ' + image.src;
4797         enchant.Core.instance.dispatchEvent(e);
4798         surface.dispatchEvent(e);
4799     };
4800     image.onload = function() {
4801         surface.width = image.width;
4802         surface.height = image.height;
4803         surface.dispatchEvent(new enchant.Event('load'));
4804     };
4805     image.src = src;
4806     return surface;
4807 };
4808 enchant.Surface._staticCanvas2DContext = document.createElement('canvas').getContext('2d');
4809 
4810 enchant.Surface._getPattern = function(surface, force) {
4811     if (!surface._pattern || force) {
4812         surface._pattern = this._staticCanvas2DContext.createPattern(surface._element, 'repeat');
4813     }
4814     return surface._pattern;
4815 };
4816 
4817 if (window.Deferred) {
4818     enchant.Deferred = window.Deferred;
4819 } else {
4820     enchant.Deferred = enchant.Class.create({
4821         initialize: function() {
4822             this._succ = this._fail = this._next = this._id = null;
4823             this._tail = this;
4824         },
4825         next: function(func) {
4826             var q = new enchant.Deferred();
4827             q._succ = func;
4828             return this._add(q);
4829         },
4830         error: function(func) {
4831             var q = new enchant.Deferred();
4832             q._fail = func;
4833             return this._add(q);
4834         },
4835         _add: function(queue) {
4836             this._tail._next = queue;
4837             this._tail = queue;
4838             return this;
4839         },
4840         call: function(arg) {
4841             var received;
4842             var queue = this;
4843             while (queue && !queue._succ) {
4844                 queue = queue._next;
4845             }
4846             if (!(queue instanceof enchant.Deferred)) {
4847                 return;
4848             }
4849             try {
4850                 received = queue._succ(arg);
4851             } catch (e) {
4852                 return queue.fail(e);
4853             }
4854             if (received instanceof enchant.Deferred) {
4855                 enchant.Deferred._insert(queue, received);
4856             } else if (queue._next instanceof enchant.Deferred) {
4857                 queue._next.call(received);
4858             }
4859         },
4860         fail: function(arg) {
4861             var result, err,
4862                 queue = this;
4863             while (queue && !queue._fail) {
4864                 queue = queue._next;
4865             }
4866             if (queue instanceof enchant.Deferred) {
4867                 result = queue._fail(arg);
4868                 queue.call(result);
4869             } else if (arg instanceof Error) {
4870                 throw arg;
4871             } else {
4872                 err = new Error('failed in Deferred');
4873                 err.arg = arg;
4874                 throw err;
4875             }
4876         }
4877     });
4878     enchant.Deferred._insert = function(queue, ins) {
4879         if (queue._next instanceof enchant.Deferred) {
4880             ins._next = queue._next;
4881         }
4882         queue._next = ins;
4883     };
4884     enchant.Deferred.next = function(func) {
4885         var q = new enchant.Deferred().next(func);
4886         q._id = setTimeout(function() { q.call(); }, 0);
4887         return q;
4888     };
4889     enchant.Deferred.parallel = function(arg) {
4890         var q = new enchant.Deferred();
4891         q._id = setTimeout(function() { q.call(); }, 0);
4892         var progress = 0;
4893         var ret = (arg instanceof Array) ? [] : {};
4894         var p = new enchant.Deferred();
4895         for (var prop in arg) {
4896             if (arg.hasOwnProperty(prop)) {
4897                 progress++;
4898                 /*jshint loopfunc:true */
4899                 (function(queue, name) {
4900                     queue.next(function(arg) {
4901                         progress--;
4902                         ret[name] = arg;
4903                         if (progress <= 0) {
4904                             p.call(ret);
4905                         }
4906                     })
4907                     .error(function(err) { p.fail(err); });
4908                     if (typeof queue._id === 'number') {
4909                         clearTimeout(queue._id);
4910                     }
4911                     queue._id = setTimeout(function() { queue.call(); }, 0);
4912                 }(arg[prop], prop));
4913             }
4914         }
4915         if (!progress) {
4916             p._id = setTimeout(function() { p.call(ret); }, 0);
4917         }
4918         return q.next(function() { return p; });
4919     };
4920 }

4922 /**
4923  * @scope enchant.DOMSound.prototype
4924  * @type {*}
4925  */
4926 enchant.DOMSound = enchant.Class.create(enchant.EventTarget, {
4927     /**
4928      * @name enchant.DOMSound
4929      * @class
4930      * audio要素をラップしたクラス.
4931      *
4932      * MP3ファイルの再生はSafari, Chrome, Firefox, Opera, IEが対応
4933      * (Firefox, OperaではFlashを経由して再生). WAVEファイルの再生は
4934      * Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Operaが対応している. ブラウザが音声ファイル
4935      * のコーデックに対応していない場合は再生されない.
4936      *
4937      * コンストラクタではなく{@link enchant.DOMSound.load}を通じてインスタンスを作成する.
4938      * @constructs
4939      */
4940     initialize: function() {
4941         enchant.EventTarget.call(this);
4942         /**
4943          * Soundの再生時間 (秒).
4944          * @type {Number}
4945          */
4946         this.duration = 0;
4947         throw new Error("Illegal Constructor");
4948     },
4949     /**
4950      * 再生を開始する.
4951      */
4952     play: function() {
4953         if (this._element) {
4954             this._element.play();
4955         }
4956     },
4957     /**
4958      * 再生を中断する.
4959      */
4960     pause: function() {
4961         if (this._element) {
4962             this._element.pause();
4963         }
4964     },
4965     /**
4966      * 再生を停止する.
4967      */
4968     stop: function() {
4969         this.pause();
4970         this.currentTime = 0;
4971     },
4972     /**
4973      * Soundを複製する.
4974      * @return {enchant.DOMSound} 複製されたSound.
4975      */
4976     clone: function() {
4977         var clone;
4978         if (this._element instanceof Audio) {
4979             clone = Object.create(enchant.DOMSound.prototype, {
4980                 _element: { value: this._element.cloneNode(false) },
4981                 duration: { value: this.duration }
4982             });
4983         } else if (enchant.ENV.USE_FLASH_SOUND) {
4984             return this;
4985         } else {
4986             clone = Object.create(enchant.DOMSound.prototype);
4987         }
4988         enchant.EventTarget.call(clone);
4989         return clone;
4990     },
4991     /**
4992      * 現在の再生位置 (秒).
4993      * @type {Number}
4994      */
4995     currentTime: {
4996         get: function() {
4997             return this._element ? this._element.currentTime : 0;
4998         },
4999         set: function(time) {
5000             if (this._element) {
5001                 this._element.currentTime = time;
5002             }
5003         }
5004     },
5005     /**
5006      * ボリューム. 0 (無音) ～ 1 (フルボリューム).
5007      * @type {Number}
5008      */
5009     volume: {
5010         get: function() {
5011             return this._element ? this._element.volume : 1;
5012         },
5013         set: function(volume) {
5014             if (this._element) {
5015                 this._element.volume = volume;
5016             }
5017         }
5018     }
5019 });
5020 
5021 /**
5022  * 音声ファイルを読み込んでSoundオブジェクトを作成する.
5023  *
5024  * @param {String} src ロードする音声ファイルのパス.
5025  * @param {String} [type] 音声ファイルのMIME Type.
5026  * @param {Function} callback ロード完了時のコールバック.
5027  * @param {Function} [onerror] ロード失敗時のコールバック.
5028  * @return {enchant.DOMSound} DOMSound
5029  * @static
5030  */
5031 enchant.DOMSound.load = function(src, type, callback, onerror) {
5032     if (type == null) {
5033         var ext = enchant.Core.findExt(src);
5034         if (ext) {
5035             type = 'audio/' + ext;
5036         } else {
5037             type = '';
5038         }
5039     }
5040     type = type.replace('mp3', 'mpeg').replace('m4a', 'mp4');
5041     onerror = onerror || function() {};
5042 
5043     var sound = Object.create(enchant.DOMSound.prototype);
5044     enchant.EventTarget.call(sound);
5045     sound.addEventListener('load', callback);
5046     sound.addEventListener('error', onerror);
5047     var audio = new Audio();
5048     if (!enchant.ENV.SOUND_ENABLED_ON_MOBILE_SAFARI &&
5049         enchant.ENV.VENDOR_PREFIX === 'webkit' && enchant.ENV.TOUCH_ENABLED) {
5050         window.setTimeout(function() {
5051             sound.dispatchEvent(new enchant.Event('load'));
5052         }, 0);
5053     } else {
5054         if (!enchant.ENV.USE_FLASH_SOUND && audio.canPlayType(type)) {
5055             audio.addEventListener('canplaythrough', function() {
5056                 sound.duration = audio.duration;
5057                 sound.dispatchEvent(new enchant.Event('load'));
5058             }, false);
5059             audio.src = src;
5060             audio.load();
5061             audio.autoplay = false;
5062             audio.onerror = function() {
5063                 var e = new enchant.Event(enchant.Event.ERROR);
5064                 e.message = 'Cannot load an asset: ' + audio.src;
5065                 enchant.Core.instance.dispatchEvent(e);
5066                 sound.dispatchEvent(e);
5067             };
5068             sound._element = audio;
5069         } else if (type === 'audio/mpeg') {
5070             var embed = document.createElement('embed');
5071             var id = 'enchant-audio' + enchant.Core.instance._soundID++;
5072             embed.width = embed.height = 1;
5073             embed.name = id;
5074             embed.src = 'sound.swf?id=' + id + '&src=' + src;
5075             embed.allowscriptaccess = 'always';
5076             embed.style.position = 'absolute';
5077             embed.style.left = '-1px';
5078             sound.addEventListener('load', function() {
5079                 Object.defineProperties(embed, {
5080                     currentTime: {
5081                         get: function() {
5082                             return embed.getCurrentTime();
5083                         },
5084                         set: function(time) {
5085                             embed.setCurrentTime(time);
5086                         }
5087                     },
5088                     volume: {
5089                         get: function() {
5090                             return embed.getVolume();
5091                         },
5092                         set: function(volume) {
5093                             embed.setVolume(volume);
5094                         }
5095                     }
5096                 });
5097                 sound._element = embed;
5098                 sound.duration = embed.getDuration();
5099             });
5100             enchant.Core.instance._element.appendChild(embed);
5101             enchant.DOMSound[id] = sound;
5102         } else {
5103             window.setTimeout(function() {
5104                 sound.dispatchEvent(new enchant.Event('load'));
5105             }, 0);
5106         }
5107     }
5108     return sound;

5118 enchant.WebAudioSound = enchant.Class.create(enchant.EventTarget, {
5119     /**
5120      * @name enchant.WebAudioSound
5121      * @class
5122      * Sound wrapper class for Web Audio API (supported on some webkit-based browsers)
5123      *
5124      * @constructs
5125      */
5126     initialize: function() {
5127         if(!window.webkitAudioContext){
5128             throw new Error("This browser does not support WebAudio API.");
5129         }
5130         var actx = enchant.WebAudioSound.audioContext;
5131         enchant.EventTarget.call(this);
5132         this.src = actx.createBufferSource();
5133         this.buffer = null;
5134         this._volume = 1;
5135         this._currentTime = 0;
5136         this._state = 0;
5137         this.connectTarget = enchant.WebAudioSound.destination;
5138     },
5139     play: function(dup) {
5140         var actx = enchant.WebAudioSound.audioContext;
5141         if (this._state === 2) {
5142             this.src.connect(this.connectTarget);
5143         } else {
5144             if (this._state === 1 && !dup) {
5145                 this.src.disconnect(this.connectTarget);
5146             }
5147             this.src = actx.createBufferSource();
5148             this.src.buffer = this.buffer;
5149             this.src.gain.value = this._volume;
5150             this.src.connect(this.connectTarget);
5151             this.src.noteOn(0);
5152         }
5153         this._state = 1;
5154     },
5155     pause: function() {
5156         var actx = enchant.WebAudioSound.audioContext;
5157         this.src.disconnect(this.connectTarget);
5158         this._state = 2;
5159     },
5160     stop: function() {
5161         this.src.noteOff(0);
5162         this._state = 0;
5163     },
5164     clone: function() {
5165         var sound = new enchant.WebAudioSound();
5166         sound.buffer = this.buffer;
5167         return sound;
5168     },
5169     dulation: {
5170         get: function() {
5171             if (this.buffer) {
5172                 return this.buffer.dulation;
5173             } else {
5174                 return 0;
5175             }
5176         }
5177     },
5178     volume: {
5179         get: function() {
5180             return this._volume;
5181         },
5182         set: function(volume) {
5183             volume = Math.max(0, Math.min(1, volume));
5184             this._volume = volume;
5185             if (this.src) {
5186                 this.src.gain.value = volume;
5187             }
5188         }
5189     },
5190     currentTime: {
5191         get: function() {
5192             window.console.log('currentTime is not allowed');
5193             return this._currentTime;
5194         },
5195         set: function(time) {
5196             window.console.log('currentTime is not allowed');
5197             this._currentTime = time;
5198         }
5199     }
5200 });

5202 enchant.WebAudioSound.load = function(src, type, callback, onerror) {
5203     var canPlay = (new Audio()).canPlayType(type);
5204     var sound = new enchant.WebAudioSound();
5205     onerror = onerror || function() {};
5206     sound.addEventListener(enchant.Event.LOAD, callback);
5207     sound.addEventListener(enchant.Event.ERROR, onerror);
5208     var e = new enchant.Event(enchant.Event.ERROR);
5209     e.message = 'Cannot load an asset: ' + src;
5210     var actx, xhr;
5211     if (canPlay === 'maybe' || canPlay === 'probably') {
5212         actx = enchant.WebAudioSound.audioContext;
5213         xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
5214         xhr.responseType = 'arraybuffer';
5215         xhr.open('GET', src, true);
5216         xhr.onload = function() {
5217             actx.decodeAudioData(
5218                 xhr.response,
5219                 function(buffer) {
5220                     sound.buffer = buffer;
5221                     sound.dispatchEvent(new enchant.Event(enchant.Event.LOAD));
5222                 },
5223                 function(error) {
5224                     enchant.Core.instance.dispatchEvent(e);
5225                     sound.dispatchEvent(e);
5226                 }
5227             );
5228         };
5229         xhr.send(null);
5230     } else {
5231         setTimeout(function() {
5232             sound.dispatchEvent(e);
5233         }, 50);
5234     }
5235     return sound;
5236 };

5256 /**
5257  * イージング関数ライブラリ
5258  * {@link enchant.Easing} 以下にある関数は全て t(現在の時刻), b(初期値), c(変化後の値), d(値の変化にかける時間) の引数を取り、指定した時刻に取る値を返す。
5259  * ActionScript で広く使われている Robert Penner による Easing Equations を JavaScript に移植した。
5260  *
5261  * @see http://www.robertpenner.com/easing/
5262  * @see http://www.robertpenner.com/easing/penner_chapter7_tweening.pdf
5263  * Easing function library, from "Easing Equations" by Robert Penner.
5264  * @type {Object}
5265  * @namespace
5266  * {@link enchant.Tween} クラスで用いるイージング関数のライブラリ名前空間.
5267  */
5268 enchant.Easing = {
5269     /**
5270      * @param t
5271      * @param b
5272      * @param c
5273      * @param d
5274      * @return {Number}
5275      */
5276     LINEAR: function(t, b, c, d) {
5277         return c * t / d + b;
5278     },
5279     /**
5280      * @param t
5281      * @param b
5282      * @param c
5283      * @param d
5284      * @return {Number}
5285      */
5286     SWING: function(t, b, c, d) {
5287         return c * (0.5 - Math.cos(((t / d) * Math.PI)) / 2) + b;
5288     },
5289     // quad
5290     /**
5291      * @param t
5292      * @param b
5293      * @param c
5294      * @param d
5295      * @return {Number}
5296      */
5297     QUAD_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d) {
5298         return c * (t /= d) * t + b;
5299     },
5300     /**
5301      * @param t
5302      * @param b
5303      * @param c
5304      * @param d
5305      * @return {Number}
5306      */
5307     QUAD_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5308         return -c * (t /= d) * (t - 2) + b;
5309     },
5310     /**
5311      * @param t
5312      * @param b
5313      * @param c
5314      * @param d
5315      * @return {Number}
5316      */
5317     QUAD_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5318         if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) {
5319             return c / 2 * t * t + b;
5320         }
5321         return -c / 2 * ((--t) * (t - 2) - 1) + b;
5322     },
5323     // cubic
5324     /**
5325      * @param t
5326      * @param b
5327      * @param c
5328      * @param d
5329      * @return {Number}
5330      */
5331     CUBIC_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d) {
5332         return c * (t /= d) * t * t + b;
5333     },
5334     /**
5335      * @param t
5336      * @param b
5337      * @param c
5338      * @param d
5339      * @return {Number}
5340      */
5341     CUBIC_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5342         return c * ((t = t / d - 1) * t * t + 1) + b;
5343     },
5344     /**
5345      * @param t
5346      * @param b
5347      * @param c
5348      * @param d
5349      * @return {Number}
5350      */
5351     CUBIC_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5352         if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) {
5353             return c / 2 * t * t * t + b;
5354         }
5355         return c / 2 * ((t -= 2) * t * t + 2) + b;
5356     },
5357     // quart
5358     /**
5359      * @param t
5360      * @param b
5361      * @param c
5362      * @param d
5363      * @return {Number}
5364      */
5365     QUART_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d) {
5366         return c * (t /= d) * t * t * t + b;
5367     },
5368     /**
5369      * @param t
5370      * @param b
5371      * @param c
5372      * @param d
5373      * @return {Number}
5374      */
5375     QUART_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5376         return -c * ((t = t / d - 1) * t * t * t - 1) + b;
5377     },
5378     /**
5379      * @param t
5380      * @param b
5381      * @param c
5382      * @param d
5383      * @return {Number}
5384      */
5385     QUART_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5386         if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) {
5387             return c / 2 * t * t * t * t + b;
5388         }
5389         return -c / 2 * ((t -= 2) * t * t * t - 2) + b;
5390     },
5391     // quint
5392     /**
5393      * @param t
5394      * @param b
5395      * @param c
5396      * @param d
5397      * @return {Number}
5398      */
5399     QUINT_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d) {
5400         return c * (t /= d) * t * t * t * t + b;
5401     },
5402     /**
5403      * @param t
5404      * @param b
5405      * @param c
5406      * @param d
5407      * @return {Number}
5408      */
5409     QUINT_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5410         return c * ((t = t / d - 1) * t * t * t * t + 1) + b;
5411     },
5412     /**
5413      * @param t
5414      * @param b
5415      * @param c
5416      * @param d
5417      * @return {Number}
5418      */
5419     QUINT_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5420         if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) {
5421             return c / 2 * t * t * t * t * t + b;
5422         }
5423         return c / 2 * ((t -= 2) * t * t * t * t + 2) + b;
5424     },
5425     //sin
5426     /**
5427      * @param t
5428      * @param b
5429      * @param c
5430      * @param d
5431      * @return {Number}
5432      */
5433     SIN_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d) {
5434         return -c * Math.cos(t / d * (Math.PI / 2)) + c + b;
5435     },
5436     /**
5437      * @param t
5438      * @param b
5439      * @param c
5440      * @param d
5441      * @return {Number}
5442      */
5443     SIN_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5444         return c * Math.sin(t / d * (Math.PI / 2)) + b;
5445     },
5446     /**
5447      * @param t
5448      * @param b
5449      * @param c
5450      * @param d
5451      * @return {Number}
5452      */
5453     SIN_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5454         return -c / 2 * (Math.cos(Math.PI * t / d) - 1) + b;
5455     },
5456     // circ
5457     /**
5458      * @param t
5459      * @param b
5460      * @param c
5461      * @param d
5462      * @return {Number}
5463      */
5464     CIRC_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d) {
5465         return -c * (Math.sqrt(1 - (t /= d) * t) - 1) + b;
5466     },
5467     /**
5468      * @param t
5469      * @param b
5470      * @param c
5471      * @param d
5472      * @return {Number}
5473      */
5474     CIRC_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5475         return c * Math.sqrt(1 - (t = t / d - 1) * t) + b;
5476     },
5477     /**
5478      * @param t
5479      * @param b
5480      * @param c
5481      * @param d
5482      * @return {Number}
5483      */
5484     CIRC_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5485         if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) {
5486             return -c / 2 * (Math.sqrt(1 - t * t) - 1) + b;
5487         }
5488         return c / 2 * (Math.sqrt(1 - (t -= 2) * t) + 1) + b;
5489     },
5490     // elastic
5491     /**
5492      * @param t
5493      * @param b
5494      * @param c
5495      * @param d
5496      * @return {Number}
5497      */
5498     ELASTIC_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d, a, p) {
5499         if (t === 0) {
5500             return b;
5501         }
5502         if ((t /= d) === 1) {
5503             return b + c;
5504         }
5505 
5506         if (!p) {
5507             p = d * 0.3;
5508         }
5509 
5510         var s;
5511         if (!a || a < Math.abs(c)) {
5512             a = c;
5513             s = p / 4;
5514         } else {
5515             s = p / (2 * Math.PI) * Math.asin(c / a);
5516         }
5517         return -(a * Math.pow(2, 10 * (t -= 1)) * Math.sin((t * d - s) * (2 * Math.PI) / p)) + b;
5518     },
5519     /**
5520      * @param t
5521      * @param b
5522      * @param c
5523      * @param d
5524      * @return {Number}
5525      */
5526     ELASTIC_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d, a, p) {
5527         if (t === 0) {
5528             return b;
5529         }
5530         if ((t /= d) === 1) {
5531             return b + c;
5532         }
5533         if (!p) {
5534             p = d * 0.3;
5535         }
5536         var s;
5537         if (!a || a < Math.abs(c)) {
5538             a = c;
5539             s = p / 4;
5540         } else {
5541             s = p / (2 * Math.PI) * Math.asin(c / a);
5542         }
5543         return (a * Math.pow(2, -10 * t) * Math.sin((t * d - s) * (2 * Math.PI) / p) + c + b);
5544     },
5545     /**
5546      * @param t
5547      * @param b
5548      * @param c
5549      * @param d
5550      * @return {Number}
5551      */
5552     ELASTIC_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d, a, p) {
5553         if (t === 0) {
5554             return b;
5555         }
5556         if ((t /= d / 2) === 2) {
5557             return b + c;
5558         }
5559         if (!p) {
5560             p = d * (0.3 * 1.5);
5561         }
5562         var s;
5563         if (!a || a < Math.abs(c)) {
5564             a = c;
5565             s = p / 4;
5566         } else {
5567             s = p / (2 * Math.PI) * Math.asin(c / a);
5568         }
5569         if (t < 1) {
5570             return -0.5 * (a * Math.pow(2, 10 * (t -= 1)) * Math.sin((t * d - s) * (2 * Math.PI) / p)) + b;
5571         }
5572         return a * Math.pow(2, -10 * (t -= 1)) * Math.sin((t * d - s) * (2 * Math.PI) / p) * 0.5 + c + b;
5573     },
5574     // bounce
5575     /**
5576      * @param t
5577      * @param b
5578      * @param c
5579      * @param d
5580      * @return {Number}
5581      */
5582     BOUNCE_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5583         if ((t /= d) < (1 / 2.75)) {
5584             return c * (7.5625 * t * t) + b;
5585         } else if (t < (2 / 2.75)) {
5586             return c * (7.5625 * (t -= (1.5 / 2.75)) * t + 0.75) + b;
5587         } else if (t < (2.5 / 2.75)) {
5588             return c * (7.5625 * (t -= (2.25 / 2.75)) * t + 0.9375) + b;
5589         } else {
5590             return c * (7.5625 * (t -= (2.625 / 2.75)) * t + 0.984375) + b;
5591         }
5592     },
5593     /**
5594      * @param t
5595      * @param b
5596      * @param c
5597      * @param d
5598      * @return {Number}
5599      */
5600     BOUNCE_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d) {
5601         return c - enchant.Easing.BOUNCE_EASEOUT(d - t, 0, c, d) + b;
5602     },
5603     /**
5604      * @param t
5605      * @param b
5606      * @param c
5607      * @param d
5608      * @return {Number}
5609      */
5610     BOUNCE_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5611         if (t < d / 2) {
5612             return enchant.Easing.BOUNCE_EASEIN(t * 2, 0, c, d) * 0.5 + b;
5613         } else {
5614             return enchant.Easing.BOUNCE_EASEOUT(t * 2 - d, 0, c, d) * 0.5 + c * 0.5 + b;
5615         }
5616 
5617     },
5618     // back
5619     /**
5620      * @param t
5621      * @param b
5622      * @param c
5623      * @param d
5624      * @return {Number}
5625      */
5626     BACK_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d, s) {
5627         if (s === undefined) {
5628             s = 1.70158;
5629         }
5630         return c * (t /= d) * t * ((s + 1) * t - s) + b;
5631     },
5632     /**
5633      * @param t
5634      * @param b
5635      * @param c
5636      * @param d
5637      * @return {Number}
5638      */
5639     BACK_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d, s) {
5640         if (s === undefined) {
5641             s = 1.70158;
5642         }
5643         return c * ((t = t / d - 1) * t * ((s + 1) * t + s) + 1) + b;
5644     },
5645     /**
5646      * @param t
5647      * @param b
5648      * @param c
5649      * @param d
5650      * @return {Number}
5651      */
5652     BACK_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d, s) {
5653         if (s === undefined) {
5654             s = 1.70158;
5655         }
5656         if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) {
5657             return c / 2 * (t * t * (((s *= (1.525)) + 1) * t - s)) + b;
5658         }
5659         return c / 2 * ((t -= 2) * t * (((s *= (1.525)) + 1) * t + s) + 2) + b;
5660     },
5661     // expo
5662     /**
5663      * @param t
5664      * @param b
5665      * @param c
5666      * @param d
5667      * @return {Number}
5668      */
5669     EXPO_EASEIN: function(t, b, c, d) {
5670         return (t === 0) ? b : c * Math.pow(2, 10 * (t / d - 1)) + b;
5671     },
5672     /**
5673      * @param t
5674      * @param b
5675      * @param c
5676      * @param d
5677      * @return {Number}
5678      */
5679     EXPO_EASEOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5680         return (t === d) ? b + c : c * (-Math.pow(2, -10 * t / d) + 1) + b;
5681     },
5682     /**
5683      * @param t
5684      * @param b
5685      * @param c
5686      * @param d
5687      * @return {Number}
5688      */
5689     EXPO_EASEINOUT: function(t, b, c, d) {
5690         if (t === 0) {
5691             return b;
5692         }
5693         if (t === d) {
5694             return b + c;
5695         }
5696         if ((t /= d / 2) < 1) {
5697             return c / 2 * Math.pow(2, 10 * (t - 1)) + b;
5698         }
5699         return c / 2 * (-Math.pow(2, -10 * --t) + 2) + b;
5700     }
5701 };

5707 /**
5708  * @scope enchant.ActionEventTarget.prototype
5709  * @type {*}
5710  */
5711 enchant.ActionEventTarget = enchant.Class.create(enchant.EventTarget, {
5712     /**
5713      * @name enchant.ActionEventTarget
5714      * @class
5715      * {@link enchant.Action} クラス向けに拡張された {@link enchant.EventTarget} クラス .
5716      * @constructs
5717      * @extends enchant.EventTarget
5718      */
5719     initialize: function() {
5720         enchant.EventTarget.apply(this, arguments);
5721     },
5722     /**
5723      * Issue event.
5724      * @param {enchant.Event} e Event issued.
5725      */
5726     dispatchEvent: function(e) {
5727         var target;
5728         if (this.node) {
5729             target = this.node;
5730             e.target = target;
5731             e.localX = e.x - target._offsetX;
5732             e.localY = e.y - target._offsetY;
5733         } else {
5734             this.node = null;
5735         }
5736 
5737         if (this['on' + e.type] != null) {
5738             this['on' + e.type].call(target, e);
5739         }
5740         var listeners = this._listeners[e.type];
5741         if (listeners != null) {
5742             listeners = listeners.slice();
5743             for (var i = 0, len = listeners.length; i < len; i++) {
5744                 listeners[i].call(target, e);
5745             }
5746         }
5747     }
5748 });
